description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
We'd like to present some minor but mighty improvements to Spark.
This update includes:
- Added a shortcut for the fast switching to Meeting Notes in the sidebar: Ctrl+Shift+3.
- +AI Translate (part of Premium): It now better detects and remembers the last translation language used, offering it as the default for subsequent translations.
- Automatic calendar account detection when connecting to Google Meet from meeting pop-up.
If you have any questions or encounter any issues, please contact us at
support@sparkmailapp.com
P.S. If you encounter any issues with the automatic update, please use the following link to download the update manually:
https://downloads.sparkmailapp.com/Spark3/win/dist/3.22.7.105396/Spark.exe
